message: Generated 5 cognitive therapy questions: 2 tricky (ABCD target component, REBT vs CBT disputing), 3 application (negative triad identification, automatic thought recognition, thoughts-not-situations principle). All questions include detailed explanations for correct and ALL incorrect options.

topics_covered: REBT disputing vs CBT cognitive restructuring
Cognitive principle: thoughts not situations cause reactions
distinguishes: REBT (Ellis) - ABCD model, disputing irrational beliefs
Beck's Cognitive Therapy - automatic thoughts, negative triad
